** Configure =load-path=

   Add all my packages to the =load-path=:
   
   #+begin_src elisp
     (dolist (i (list (concat user-emacs-directory "pgpb")))
       ;; Add all at end of `load-path' to avoid conflicts.
       (add-to-list 'load-path (file-name-as-directory i) t))
   #+end_src
